citation: Land Use Planning and Approvals Amendment Act 2022 (Tas)
text:
Land Use Planning and Approvals Amendment Act 2022

An Act to amend the Land Use Planning and Approvals Act 1993
[Royal Assent 30 November 2022]

Be it enacted by Her Excellency the Governor of Tasmania, by and with the advice and consent of the Legislative Council and House of Assembly, in Parliament assembled, as follows:

1. Short title
    This Act may be cited as the Land Use Planning and Approvals Amendment Act 2022 .

2. Commencement
    The provisions of this Act commence on a day or days to be proclaimed.

3. Principal Act
    In this Act, the Land Use Planning and Approvals Act 1993 is referred to as the Principal Act.

4.
    The amendment effected by this section has been incorporated into the authorised version of the Land Use Planning and Approvals Act 1993 .

5.
    The amendments effected by this section have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Land Use Planning and Approvals Act 1993 .

38. Repeal of Act
    This Act is repealed on the first anniversary of the day on which the last uncommenced provision of this Act commenced.
